author: CTPPS
body:
#### PR description:

This is the remaining code of the PPS full simulation after the proton transport been merged into the release. It contains changes in old code (already in the release) needed to run the PPS simulation as well as new code. All comments from PR #24545 were implemented and a deeper search for "cout", CLHEP dependencies, etc, have been also done (hopefully there is nothing left behind).

#### PR validation:

All the tests have been done: 
scram b code-checks (ok)
scram b runtests (ok)
runTheMatrix ...  ended up with the message:
32 31 30 23 11 2 1 1 1 tests passed, 0 0 0 1 0 0 0 0 0 failed

Since the packages contain code inherited from TOTEM, which follows different code conventions, as said above, a thorough search for coding compliant violation has been done.
title: PPS Full simulation
